description: Lord Baral was known for his exceptional grapes and wines that he grew in his personal vineyards to the north. His techniques were kept a secret within his family for several generations, but the methods eventually made their way into the hands of other Darknuts.
tooltip: Lord Baral was known for his exceptional grapes and wines that he grew in his personal vineyards to the north. His techniques were kept a secret within his family for several generations, but the methods eventually made their way into the hands of other Darknuts. (Garrisoned Thralls' food generation increases by +1)
